plot: Short documentary about La Rioja: monuments, art, monasteries, castles, craftmanship, wines, grape-recolection festivities, a procession and the 'Danza de los Zancos' (dance).
title: Vamos a La Rioja
plot_es: Short documentary about La Rioja: monuments, art, monasteries, castles, craftmanship, wines, grape-recolection festivities, a procession and the 'Danza de los Zancos' (dance).
plot_en: Short documentary about La Rioja: monuments, art, monasteries, castles, craftmanship, wines, grape-recolection festivities, a procession and the 'Danza de los Zancos' (dance).
